title: Here are all the 2019 Emmy winners
text:
The 2019 Emmys aired live from the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles on Sunday.

HBO's hit drama "Game of Thrones" led the nominations with 32 total. Maisie Williams, Sophie Turner, Kit Harington, and Emilia Clarke are just a few of the stars that were recognized for their work on the show.



Series like Amazon's "The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel," FX's "Fosse/Verdon," and HBO's "Chernobyl" also earned plenty of nominations.

The big winners for the comedy and drama TV series awards were Amazon's "Fleabag" and HBO's "Game of Thrones."

Keep reading for the list of nominees and winners (*in bold*).
description: HBO's "Game of Thrones" and Amazon's "Fleabag" won the big series awards of Sunday's awards show.
